One filter in rptdesign is defined as followed:

                            <list-property name="filter">
                                <structure>
                                    <expression name="expr">row["SALESREPEMPLOYEENUMBER"]</expression>
                                    <expression name="value1">row._outer["EMPLOYEENUMBER"]</expression>
                                </structure>
                            </list-property>

The problem is that "EMPLOYEENUMBER" is not a column binding of the parent table of that filter.
I believe the submitter should provide the original report design, rather than the one attached. The attached rptdesign has already broken.

Created an attachment (id=46491)
old version of report design

The old report design has been attached.
The old version of report design file ran OK. Fixed.
